resources.string: This activity contains a playing screen from where we can play a certain song.

This activity is the seach activity from where the user can search for a song/album/etc. This could be implemented with the help of Text Change Listener. This could sort the playlist according to the condition

This activity holds the details of the songs which can be bought in the app store. The buy method could be implemented through google pay so users can pay in the play store so we dont have to implement our own banking interface
This activity list out the songs from the songs list. This functionality could be improved if the app automatically seaches for the songs on the phone but it would require reading permissions
